name: Binding Throw
descriptionText: You can strike your enemy and use the blow as an opportunity to grab and hold him.
benefitText: After you successfully use the Ki Throw feat on an opponent, you can use a swift action to attempt a grapple combat maneuver against that opponent.
normalText: The grapple combat maneuver is a standard action.
specialText: A monk can gain Binding Throw as a bonus feat starting at 14th level.
